## General purpose data and tools


* [ParlLawSpeech - Linked full-text corpora of 43,582 bills, 28,124 laws, and 3,092,431 plenary speeches from eight European parliaments - Schwalbach / Hetzer / Proksch / Rauh / Sebők](https://parllawspeech.org/data/)

* [ParlSpeech V2 - Full-text corpora of 6.3 million parliamentary speeches in the key legislative chambers of nine representative democracies - Rauh / Schwalbach](https://doi.org/10.7910/DVN/L4OAKN)

* [ParlSpeech - Full-text corpora of 3.9 million plenary speeches in seven European states - Rauh / De Wilde / Schwalbach](https://doi.org/10.7910/DVN/E4RSP9)

* [EU Commissioner speeches - Full-text of corpus of all 13,618 speeches  between 1985 and 2020](https://dataverse.harvard.edu/dataset.xhtml?persistentId=doi:10.7910/DVN/M2QFGM)

* [EU Commission press releases - Full-text corpus of all 44,978 press releases published between January 17, 1985, and January 8, 2021](https://doi.org/10.7910/DVN/UGGXUF) 


* [Sentiment dicitionary for German political language](https://doi.org/10.7910/DVN/BKBXWD)

* [PastTwitter - R functions to scrape and plot Twitter account info for past points in time from web.archive.org snapshots](https://github.com/ChRauh/PastTwitter)

* [ShinyApps for human coding of text snippets](https://github.com/ChRauh/TRIAS-ValidationApps)

* [ShinyApps for descriptive analysis and sharing of text corpora](https://github.com/ChRauh/OPTED-WP5-Apps-AMCAT)

-   [Rauh (2018) - Validation of German sentiment dictionary - Journal of Information Technology & Politics](https://doi.org/10.7910/DVN/BKBXWD)

-   [Rauh (2015) - EU salience in Bundestag - European Union Politics](https://www.dropbox.com/s/7p5nmt1ycsheod1/Rauh_2015_ReplicationArchive.rar)
